scripts.migrate: mix ecto.rollback --all && mix ecto.migrate && npm run pull && mix migrate_csv
scripts.add_plugins: asdf plugin-add nodejs && asdf plugin-add erlang && asdf plugin-add elixir
scripts.pg: docker rm -f ft-postgres 2>/dev/null || true && docker build -f postgres.DOCKERFILE -t ft-postgres . && docker run -d --name ft-postgres -p 5432:5432 ft-postgres
scripts.install: node run add_plugins && asdf install && node run pg
